text:
Good afternoon! I'm trying to include a blog post listing in an e-mail template, but using `{% post_listing %}` is quite limited - we need to include some more data from each blog post:

1. Title
2. Author
3. Excerpt from meta description
4. Featured image
5. and of course the url

Is this possible at all?
I've added a Post Listing module to the template, and I'm right now trying to edit the source, but struggling to get anything to work :slightly_smiling_face:
Wait.. `{% rss_listing %}` seems to work in the design previewer at least, but isn't that loaded async? Would it work when e-mail is sent out?
